bond.name: Knecht Ruprecht > Miss Santa
bond.value: Increases Miss Santa's skill DMG by 5%

skill.name: Training Present
skill.value: Restores 1347/1607 HP to all allies. Targets deal 15/17% more DMG for a limited time.

ability.name: Pure Heart (Lv. 78)
ability.value: Sharply reduces all foes' crit DMG at the start of each wave.
